title: Please help ID font i'm at my wits end
content:
Pleas help me identify this font, my client supplied me an 'old business card' and requests it to be made identical and with the same font but she doesn't know what font it is and refuses to accept a 'close to' font.

Sorry for the bad quality my scanner is broken

Hope you can help because i've been looking at too many fonts now they all just seem so similar

Thanks everyone!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-10 at 12.57.15 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225947/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-10%20at%2012.57.15%20PM.png) | 65.72 KB |
author: Paranoir Designs

comments.content: Reminds me of Goudy... [Goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/goudy) Light looks close (enough for you?), [Goudy Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/goudy-1), [Goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/goudy), [LTC Goudy Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-goudy-oldstyle)
